Vulnerability.Title: oscap-anaconda-addon bug fix update
Vulnerability.Description:
An update for oscap-anaconda-addon is now available for Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7. The oscap-anaconda-addon package provides an add-on that integrates OpenSCAP utilities with the Anaconda installer and allows users to install systems that follow restrictions given by the Security Content Automation Protocol (SCAP).
For detailed information on changes in this release, see the Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7.3 Release Notes linked from the References section.
Users of oscap-anaconda-addon are advised to upgrade to these updated packages.
Note for remediation: Please disable the SELinux for RHEL 4/5 when repairing, or some rpm packages will fail to install.
